text: Bunhe, previously called Yuzhnokomunarivsk (, ) is a city in Yenakiieve municipality, Donetsk Oblast (province) of Ukraine. Population: , 17,813 (2001). On 12 May 2016, the Verkhovna Rada renamed Yuzhnokomunarivsk Bunhe conform to the law prohibiting names of Communist origin. As the Ukrainian government does not control the city, the old name is being locally used. ==Demographics== Native language as of the Ukrainian Census of 2001: * Russian 88.45% * Ukrainian 10.84% * Belarusian 0.13% ==References== Category:Cities in Donetsk Oblast Category:Cities of district significance in Ukraine Category:Populated places established in the Russian Empire Category:City name changes in Ukraine
title: Yunokomunarivsk
